text: <@U0ZJZBJLF> - it's the new state store for v1 - there are 2 implementations - one for RocksDB (moving to goleveldb soon) and one experimental one which used couchdb
<@U0PB67X4K> what is different between stateCF and stateDeltaCF?

<@U2RMVHMK9>  CF means RocksDB column families, think of them as data partitions within the database.  stateCF is world state and stateDeltaCF are the changes in state from a certain point in time.  These are 0.5/0.6 implementations and are not in v1.
